trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> object to and from a string that represents the type name.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref> 개체와 형식 이름을 나타내는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is used for XAML extensibility by markup definitions, via <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 사용할 XAML 확장성에 대 한 태그 정의 통해 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 형식의 개체의 인스턴스로 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>, 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
Other `sourceType` inputs return `false`.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기가 호출 되는 환경에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 형식 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 변환기에는 작업에서 수행할 수 있으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 여부를 확인 <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref> 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 지정 된 형식으로 변환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
Other `destinationType` inputs return `false`.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기가 호출 되는 환경에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 형식 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 변환기에는 작업에서 수행할 수 있으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체를 변환 하려고 한 <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>, 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
Other `value` types throw an exception.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기가 호출 되는 환경에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 형식 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
The object to convert.
The converted object.
value cannot be converted.
Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 변환 하려고 한 <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref> 지정 된 형식으로 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeTypeConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> to and from a <xref:System.String> (or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
Other `value` types or `destinationType` inputs throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 다른 `value` 형식 또는 `destinationType` 입력 예외를 throw 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기가 호출 되는 환경에 대 한 정보를 제공 하는 형식 컨텍스트.

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.
The converted object.
value cannot be converted.
